helpPanel.title: Help & Guide
helpPanel.quickStartSubtitle: Get started with the admin panel

steps.step1Text: Your role ({role}) determines which features you can access. Check the navigation menu to see available sections.
steps.step2Text: Use the year dropdown in the top navigation to switch between different event years. All data (subscriptions, assignments) is year-specific.
steps.step3Text: Start at the Dashboard to see an overview of markers, companies, and event statistics. This gives you a quick snapshot of your current data.
steps.step4Item1: Add companies in the Companies tab
steps.step5Text: Click "Current Page" tab in this help panel to see specific guidance for each section. Hover over (?) icons for quick tooltips.

helpPanel.footer: Need more help? Contact your system administrator
